subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Two of the N.B.A.’s riveting stars — Kobe Bryant and Gilbert Arenas — spent last night trying to outdo each other, point for point, flashy move for flashy move, with their last meeting seven weeks ago very much on their minds. The much-anticipated Round 2 went to Bryant, who scored 39 points to lead the Los Angeles Lakers past Arenas and the host Washington Wizards, 118-102.
